preference.name: IMM_LABORATORY_SERVER_DETAILS
preference.preference_description: Specifies the details of the server to use for a laboratory extension. Only the following values are required. *First Entry : Full URL of server for eg. https://<host_name>:<server_port>/en/db/app/plugins.tcmaster.tcslave/ *Second Entry : CURL Bearer token to connect to server i.e. Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS_TOKEN>
